text: All revenues from the following sources shall be deposited into the Fund:

sections.text: Steam (including arrearage payments) for the Correctional Treatment Facility received by the District since October 1, 2007; and

Aggregate revenues in excess of $88 million received in any one fiscal year beginning on or after October 1, 2012, from fines paid due to automated photo enforcement; except, that in fiscal year 2014, it shall be in excess of $92.5 million.

chapter.text: Emergency and Non-Emergency Number Telephone System Assessments Fund.
